topic.title: How to Set the Camera on a Tripod
topic.shortdesc: These instructions will show you how to mount the camera on a tripod for increased stability

li.p: Camera
Tripod
Tripod Bag
Tripod Pads
Camera Tripod Cover
Tripod Top Cover
Put the camera on a safe surface before handling the tripod
Unzip the tripod out of its bag
Locate the three tripad pads
Secure the three pads on the bottom of the three legs
This will make sure the tripod stays stable on the ground
Take off the tripod top cover as this will reveal the screw formation on top
Put the tripod top cover and tripod bag in a clear and safe location
Locate the bottom of the camera and its tripod cover
Unscrew the tripod cover from the camera gently
Be careful and hold the camera tightly with the other hand in order to not drop it
Put the tripod cover in a clear and safe location
Sit down with the tripod and the camera
Sitting is highly recommended to make sure no equipment is ruined from being dropped from standing height
Screw the tripod's top into the camera's tripod hole
Hold the setup (tripod and camera) with both hands as you unfold the legs of the tripod
Set up your tripod in a location for the best angle for your shot
Use the camera and tripod to take stable pictures
